Description: Up to 3 postdoc positions available to work in Dr. Luke Chang's Computational Social Affective Neuroscience lab on research investigating naturalistic elicitations of emotional experiences using fMRI, intracranial EEG, and facial expressions.
Open rank search for 2 faculty positions.  Research focus on social interactions, naturalistic experimental designs, and computational modeling.
Up to 4 postdoc available to work with Dr. Tor Wager's Cognitive Affective Neuroscience Lab on projects related to emotion, pain, and placebo.
